Room.Name: Oak Tree
Room.ShortDescription: You are on one of the limbs of a giant oak tree inside the park.
Room.LongDescription: The large oak tree appears to support your weight well. You have reached one of the major points in the park. If you wish to train, you should go onto the tree limb. If you wish to leave the park, you should go out. If you wish to continue through the park, you will need to find tracks at the bottom of the tree.
